Gulf Harbour homicide: Body in bag victim identified as Shulai Wang, 70 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gulf-harbour-homicide-body-in-bag-victim-identified-as-shulai-wang-70/A5DXDZRB4JDKLMYQ2O6SHKI7OE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gulf-harbour-homicide-body-in-bag-victim-identified-as-shulai-wang-70/A5DXDZRB4JDKLMYQ2O6SHKI7OE/ The body was found wrapped in plastic floating in the ocean in March. Fri, 25 Oct 2024 00:54:50 +0000 Police have revealed the identity of the Gulf Harbour victim, Shulai Wang, 70, of China. Photo / Police

Police Minister: Better parenting needed to tackle youth crime in Gisborne/Tairāwhiti https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/police-minister-better-parenting-needed-to-tackle-youth-crime-in-gisbornetairawiti/OGYNAM76YRG2FGH4EPLDXQFBWQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/police-minister-better-parenting-needed-to-tackle-youth-crime-in-gisbornetairawiti/OGYNAM76YRG2FGH4EPLDXQFBWQ/ Murray RobertsonMore support from justice system, whole-of-community response needed: Mitchell Thu, 24 Oct 2024 23:53:07 +0000 Emergency Management Minister Mark Mitchell and Mayor Rehette Stoltz at Thursday's ShakeOut exercise at Wainui Beach School. Mitchell, in his role as Police Minister, spoke with the Gisborne Herald about the issue of increased youth crime. Photo / Murray Robertson
